steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add the sliced onion and cook until it becomes translucent.
Add the bell pepper and zucchini to the pan, stirring occasionally.
Once the vegetables start to soften, add the chopped tomatoes.
Season with salt and pepper, and add a splash of soy sauce if desired.
Continue to cook until all vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Serve warm as a side dish or over rice or noodles for a main dish.

steps: Crack the eggs into a bowl, add a pinch of salt, and beat well.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan over medium heat. Scramble the eggs until just set, then remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil and the tomatoes. Cook until soft.
Add salt, pepper, and sugar to the tomatoes. Stir well.
Return the scrambled eggs to the pan, gently mixing them with the tomatoes.
Cook for another minute to combine the flavors.
Garnish with chopped spring onions if desired. Serve warm.
image_prompt: Tomato and Egg Stir-fry, realistic food photography, single serving, no text or logos, clean background, simple home-style plating in a plain bowl or plate, minimal props, natural light, overhead or 45° angle
